page.title: 10Our Impressions Of The Patch
page.content:
" I think it's a very beautiful area but too quiet for me"
"I would prefer to live in our town than in our patch.It's too lonely there.Imagine living in a deserted place with not another house for miles."
"I think I'd rather live in our Patch because there would be peace and quiet and hardly any traffic"
"I like our Patch a lot. There are beautiful views and an old castle. There is a mobile library which brings books for the lonely houses"
"I would rather live here closer to the shops and my friends "
